title: E-Learning System Development and Management Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Customized VR simulation-based program to develop e-learning system operation competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core components of an e-learning system (platform, content, assessment tools) and develop context-appropriate development plans.
Learners can design e-learning operation strategies that optimize learner-instructor interaction in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can apply practical protocols to resolve technical issues (accessibility, compatibility) that occur during e-learning system management.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
